title: Chicken and Herbs in White Wine

content.eamr: ( ing-1 "1 (4 pound) chicken, cut into pieces" )

content.text: 0) Heat olive oil in a large Dutch oven over medium heat.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "Heat"@3:7 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "olive oil"@8:17 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a large Dutch oven"@21:39 / TOOL )
		:heat ( temp-0-0 "medium heat"@45:56 / TEMPERATURE )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Sprinkle chicken with garlic powder, and brown on both sides.
3) Spoon off chicken fat, and return pan to stove.
4) Stir in mushrooms and onions; cook, stirring occasionally, until onions are soft.
content.eamr:
( inst-4 / R
	:inform ( ac-4-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "mushrooms"@11:20 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "onions"@25:31 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-4-1 "cook, stirring"@33:47 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:until ( cond-4-0 "until onions are soft"@62:83 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
	)
)

content.text: 6) In a separate bowl, mix together basil, oregano, rosemary, and thyme.
content.eamr:
( inst-6 / R
	:inform ( ac-6-0 "mix"@23:26 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-5 "basil"@36:41 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "oregano"@43:50 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "rosemary"@52:60 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-8 "thyme"@66:71 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-6-0 "a separate bowl"@6:21 / TOOL )
	)
)

content.text: 7) Season with garlic salt, pepper, and poultry seasoning.
content.eamr:
( inst-7 / R
	:inform ( ac-7-0 "Season"@3:9 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-9 "garlic salt"@15:26 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-10 "pepper"@28:34 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-11 "poultry seasoning"@40:57 / FOOD )
		:gol ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 8) Stir in wine, and add to onion and mushrooms.
content.eamr:
( inst-8 / R
	:inform ( ac-8-0 "Stir in"@3:10 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-12 "wine"@11:15 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-8-1 "add"@21:24 / AC
		:ppt ( "onion"@28:33 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "mushrooms"@38:47 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 10) Pour mushroom mixture and broth over chicken; cover, and cook over low heat until meat begins to fall off the bone, about 1 1/2 hours.
content.eamr:
( inst-10 / R
	:inform ( ac-10-0 "Pour"@4:8 / AC
		:ppt ( "mushroom mixture"@9:25 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-13 "broth"@30:35 / FOOD )
		:gol ( "chicken"@41:48 / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-10-1 "cover, and cook"@50:65 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:heat ( temp-10-0 "low heat"@71:79 / TEMPERATURE )
		:until ( cond-10-0 "until meat begins to fall off the bone"@80:118 / CONDITION_CLAUSE )
		:duration ( dur-10-0 "1 1/2 hours"@126:137 / DUR )
	)
)
